Description: You summon a rock-hard ball of ice that continues to pummel a creature. When you activate this move, make a ranged attack on a target in range, doing ice damage on a hit. If you continue to use this move on consecutive turns, double the dice roll for damage each time you hit. The multiplier maxes out at 8x the original damage. The damage resets if any of the attacks miss, or if you are incapacitated.
